import React from "react"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; /** * HomePage - Prototype home dashboard for Educative AI Game * This page is intentionally self-contained with inline styles * so you can drop it into a Create React App project without extra deps. */ export default function HomePage({ user, onStartGame, onGenerateQuiz, onLogout }) { const navigate = useNavigate(); const displayName = user?.email?.split("@")[0] ?? "Educator"; return (
üß†
Educative AI
Generative Quiz & Classroom Play
Hi, {displayName}

Turn any topic into a playable quiz in seconds

Paste notes, upload a PDF, or pick a subject. Our AI generates multi-difficulty questions, auto-grades answers, and tracks class progress.

{/* CTA Buttons */}
{/* ‚≠ê UPDATED BUTTON ‚Äî Takes user to GenerateQuizPage */}

Quick start

    {recentActivity.map((a) => (
  • {a.title}
    {a.meta}
    {a.right}
    • ))}

Assigned quizzes

    {assigned.map((q) => (
  • {q.title}
    {q.meta}
    {q.mode} {q.count} Qs
    • ))}

How it works

  1. Input. Paste notes, upload PDF, or give a topic.
  2. Generate. AI creates questions across Easy / Medium / Hard.
  3. Host or assign. Live play with buzzers or async homework.
  4. Track. See attempts, accuracy, and mastery by concept.
Prototype: UI only, swap hooks to your real API later.
¬© {new Date().getFullYear()} Educative AI
Prototype build ‚Ä¢ v0.1
